channel.title: Comments on: White Room
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Such things can only be answered inside the White Room. It contains all of the context and clues you need.
item.content:encoded: Such things can only be answered inside the White Room. It contains all of the context and clues you need.

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: (I don't want to ask this, because I don't want to waste a question, but do we know what our first question was? Do we have memories?)
item.content:encoded: (I don’t want to ask this, because I don’t want to waste a question, but do we know what our first question was? Do we have memories?)
